entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast early this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 this evening. Low minus 6 except minus 10 inland. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming south 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries or rain showers. Temperature steady near plus 1.
